Question
========
Which statement about Python types is true?

Answerlist
----------
* Python uses dynamic typing
* Python requires type annotations
* Python has only numbers
* Python is not typed

Solution
========
Python is dynamically typed.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
